name: Square Runner (Potato_Lad)
description:
This is a game where you are a square and have to shoot the red people (we don't really like red people)

w - jump/climb

a - left

d - right

e - shoot

Jump up walls and other platforms to climb them!

Thank you for visiting this page, I hope you like this game.

Note: This game may be flagged as dangerous for chrome users because it isn't in a chrome database and isn't very common (here is someone else having the same problem: https://itch.io/t/823790/chrome-is-detecting-my-game-as-dangerous).
